website_summaries.verdict: With Shopkins, Petkins, and Rainbow Kate, this set has a lot to offer that is sure to excite any child who is enthusiastic about these fun toys.
pros: A brightly colored four-room school with ample space for Shopkins
Kids love that it comes with Rainbow Kate, Cheerleader Lil' Shoppie, and several Petkins
cons: You can only access the rooms from one side of the toy

customer_reviews.title: Toy is not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter was extremely disappointed that this toy did not come as was advertised on the packaging. She expected it to have more parts and shopkins dolls, the way it appears, but it only came with 1 shopkins doll and about half of the stuff in the picture. This is a classic example of false advertising and a product you need to buy in person in the store, so you know exactly what you are getting, because the pictures are so deceptive. Shame on the company for deceiving little kids that way. Will never buy another shopkins product again.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B Lynch

customer_reviews.title: also the other happy places tiles and playsets connect right on
customer_reviews.text: This was so much bigger then expected, and it comes already assembled and it comes with a doll and accessories, this is the cutest set, you can purchase additional rooms to fill the school if you want or you can just play as is, also the other happy places tiles and playsets connect right on, I also got this for an amazing price, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: It's too bad you can't play from both sides for the
customer_reviews.text: This is not as big as the kids hoped. It's too bad you can't play from both sides for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4~

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite set for sure
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old cannot get enough of this. Her favorite set for sure. The building itself is pretty bland and cheap, but she cant tell.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Edward Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Nice playhouse
customer_reviews.text: With 2 girls ages 3 and 6 we have TONS of shopkins. They play with the often. Nice set
customer_reviews.author: Christina G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Shopkins fans!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves to collect and play with everything Shopkins. It gets quite expensive to collect these tiny adorable beauties but they make her very happy so that’s what matters in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very very happy with
customer_reviews.text: Was much larger than I expected and is built really well. Got this during the black Friday sales, so it was a steal. Very very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Lizlie Smythers

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for our granddaughter 6th birthday and she loved it, so I bought another to keep at ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our granddaughter 6th birthday and she loved it, so I bought another to keep at our house

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchase for my grandchild for Christmas. Was very happy to receive and spent hours playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: We have a bunch of shopkins playsets but this one is pretty boring.

customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has a large collection of Shopkins and is always happy and appreciative when she receives new ones.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoyed this for Christmas! I recommend it for all the little girls out there.

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves This Set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my 9 year old daughter. She loves it! The toy was in great condition when purchased and since it was a great price on cyber Monday I couldn't let it slip thru the cracks.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected it and my daughter loves it. A+

customer_reviews.title: Some pieces are terribly small.  My grandkids love shopkins.
customer_reviews.text: This was just what my grandchildren wanted for Christmas. They have had hours and hours of fun.

customer_reviews.title: However it is a super cute set
customer_reviews.text: I did see this for a lesser price but couldn’t price match. However it is a super cute set!!

customer_reviews.title: Girls Arm Broke Off
customer_reviews.text: Cute set! But the arm broke off the girl the first day & I can't really just glue it back on.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Cover deceiving!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is liking this toy but it needs more purchases to finish. Make sure you understand what's included. Only the last picture is in the box.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging and disappointing

product_meta.title: Shopkins Happy Places Happyville High School Playset
product_meta.description: The Happyville Senior High Playset is the ultimate cool school! Plenty of spaces to create happy places! Set up the gym with some sporty Petkins. Experiment away to make a clever science display. Make a display that’s all class in the classroom, and have lunch in the cafeteria with some tasty Petkins!
feature_bullets: Comes with Exclusive Rainbow Kate Cheerleader Lil' Shoppie and exclusive Petkins!
Plenty of spaces to create happy places!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars105 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
